name: linter-verification
description: A linter for the verification tools Dafny, Chalice and Boogie.

dafnyExecutablePath.title: Dafny Executable Path
dafnyExecutablePath.description: The location of the Dafny binary. By default it is resolved from your path.

dafnyExecutableArguments.title: Dafny Executable Arguments
dafnyExecutableArguments.description: Comma separated list of options to pass to the Dafny binary. Execute `dafny /help` in your terminal to see which options are allowed.
